title: Quest Items
content: ding weapons. Used to forge Sussur weapons. Stamped Handbill A tattered, well-handled bill posted to recruit adventures. Used to forge Sussur weapons. Sussur Tree Bark A piece of tough bark from a Sussur Tree. Holding it leaves a dull tingling in your fingers. Used to forge Sussur weapons. Priestess' Key The star-like symbol etched into the handle of this key is nearly worn away. Opens the Priestess Quarters Entrance. Padlock Key A flimsy iron key found within a goblin-infested temple. ?? Eldrit
